channel.title: Need HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: can anyone tell me or give me vid how too add vengenace in icebarrage ta?

item.title: Need HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Sessy_Pk3r Sessy Pk3r
item.description:
@Sessy_Pk3r wrote:

To add vengeance into the ancients tab (for whatever reason ):
You’d need to create a new clickable area(button) in your ancients tab, load the sprite into that area, or do the first step last it’s up to you (both being client sided), and add vengeance actions for the button server-sided. Good luck with all that.

Some hints:
RSInterface.java
Clickingbuttons.java
ActionHandler.java

Assuming you’re using PI.

Read full topic

item.title: Need HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

I don’t quite understand, do you want to replace ice barrage with vengeance? in that case edit the interface with a cache editor to show the vengeance icon there, then handle its click through your action buttons. If you want to show the vengeance icon above a player’s head during ice barrage then just play the gfx/animation?

Read full topic
